âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Server Management (add, edit, delete, pin, ping) â€¢ Quick Server Navigation (fuzzy search, one-keypress SSH, tagging, sorting) â€¢ Advanced SSH Configuration (port forwarding, connection multiplexing, advanced authentication, security settings, proxy settings)
ðŸ“– Summary: Lazyssh is a terminal-based SSH manager that simplifies server management by providing an interactive UI for connecting to servers defined in the user's `~/.ssh/config` file. It allows users to quickly navigate, connect, manage, and transfer files between their local machine and servers, eliminating the need to remember IP addresses or run long scp commands.
